nodes.text: Orchis 2 was a terrestrial moon home to the Graf Archive, an immense depository of records and artifacts overseen by Director Amel Fortoon. The historian Eloc Throno studied cartography under Director Fortoon on Orchis 2. Long after 34 ABY, the Graf Archive covered most of the moon's surface. It shared its name with the Inner Rim planet Orchis.
Orchis 2 was first mentioned in Star Wars: Galactic Atlas, a 2016 reference book written by Emil Fortune and illustrated by Tim McDonagh.
